properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 8:37AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...Gainesville Lock and Dam...and Demopolis Lock and Dam...

.Heavy rainfall during the past 48 hours and additional rainfall
forecast during the next 48 hours will continue to produce rises
along the Tombigbee River...and a Flood Warning remains in effect
along the river.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until further notice... The Flood Warning continues for The Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam. * until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled. * At 8:15 AM Monday the stage was 102.8 feet. * Flood stage is 101 feet. * Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast. * Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 107.4 feet by Wednesday evening then begin falling. * Impact...At 109 feet...Flooding of some camps and cabins...as well as widespread flooding of low-lying woods and agricultural lands
